message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $900000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

I understand that you have a budget constraint, Bob. However, I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price of $800000. I'm willing to offer the product to you at $850000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $775000. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to offer the product to you at $825000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $775000 and $825000, so I'll offer $800000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
